---
title: "pastseasons_df"
---

#### Description

The `pastseasons_df` function converts the data found in the list returned by the [collect_ff](collect_ff.html) function when getting fresh data.  The default dataframe returns in the same format as the [pastseasons](pastseasons.html) dataset.

#### Usage
```{r, eval=FALSE}
pastseasons_df(player_list, add_vars = NULL)
```

#### Arguments

param | details
------|--------
player_list | the list of players returned by [collect_ff](collect_ff.html)
add_vars | extra variables to add if desired

#### Example use
```{r, eval=FALSE}
# convert list into dataframe
new_players_df <- players_df(player_list = player_list)

# convert list into dataframe and add a couple of variables, points per game
new_players_df <- players_df(player_list = player_list, add_vars = c("points_per_game"))
```
